Project Management

Project HostingÂ¶

Since we will have multiple programmers working on this project, we will need to make the code easily available. As such, it would be advantageous to host our project somewhere on web. Several project hosting sites exist that provide a number of useful tools for managing large software projects. Two of the more popular sites are Google Code and Github.

Both of these sites provide the following services

  • Free hosting
  • Version control systems
  • Wiki pages
  • Issue trackers

One of the key benefits of using a project hosting site is their integration with version control systems. Github uses Git and Google Code uses Mercurial. Both of these programs are known as DVCS, or distributed version control systems and have similar interfaces for using them.

Further research is required before we select which service to use.
